publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2177 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment (No.3) Regulations 2001-That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment (No.3) Regulations 2001 be approved. Supported by: Iain Gray*
